_header: He that in youth no care will take

PierpontM898.Transcription:
He that in youth no
                    care will take
PierpontM898.Note:
On f. 66 in right margin, top to bottom, in post-medieval, possibly
                    sixteenth- or seventeenth-century hand: ‘Bewty is sibiect vnto age;
                    Sicknes the same will stayne /And whoso wythered is with yeares cannot be younge
                    agayne’.
PierpontM898.Editions:
Bühler,  Kurt. 
             “The New Morgan Manuscript of Titus and Vespasian.” 
             PMLA
         76 (1961): 20-4: 22.
